empty_state.title: Configure a New Consumer Group
empty_state.description: Use consumer groups to manage custom rate limiting configuration for subsets of consumers.

search.placeholder: Filter by exact name or ID

delete.title: Delete a Consumer Group
delete.description: Deleting this group will remove this group from all plugins and its rate limit configuration. This action cannot be reversed.

add.title: Add To Consumer Groups
add.ctaText: Add this consumer to consumer groups
add.footer: Search by exact name or ID to find consumer groups not included in the list

exit.title: Exit from a Consumer Group
exit.confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove consumer {consumer} from consumer group {consumerGroup}?
exit.confirmationNoUsername: Are you sure you want this consumer to exit from consumer group {consumerGroup}?
exit.description: Exiting from the group could change the rate limit policy applied to this consumer.

errors.general: Consumer Groups could not be retrieved
errors.delete: The consumer group could not be deleted at this time.
errors.add: The consumer could not be added to some groups at this time.
errors.already_added: The consumer is already in this consumer group
errors.add_consumer: An unexpected error occurred while adding consumers. Please try again.
errors.remove_consumer: An unexpected error occurred while removing consumers. Please try again.

general_info.title: General Information
general_info.description: General information will help identify and manage this consumer group.

consumers.title: Consumers
consumers.description: Add or remove consumers from this group

name.label: Name
name.placeholder: Enter a unique name for this consumer group

tags.label: Tags
tags.placeholder: Enter a list of tags seperated by comma
tags.tooltip: An optional set of strings for grouping and filtering, separated by commas.

validation_errors.name: The name can be any string containing letters, numbers, or the following characters: ., -, _, or ~. Do not use spaces.
